answers.answer: Normal. Hot packs, or cold whichever feels best.

question: Hi everyone, I'm 20 years old, i have type 1 diabetes and this is my first baby, I'm really worried because I'm only 4 weeks but my breast are hurting a lot and they look way bigger now, is it normal although I'm only 4 weeks? Any advice for the pain?
title: My breast are hurting
